Power grid classes

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Carrier(name: str, type: str)

Bases: object

name: str

The name of the energy carrier (e.g., electricity, gas).

type: str

The type of the carrier (e.g., renewable, fossil).

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus(name: str, carrier: energydatamodel.powergrid.Carrier)

Bases: object

name: str

Identifier for the bus.

carrier: Carrier

The carrier associated with this bus.

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Line(name: str, start_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, end_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, capacity: float)

Bases: object

name: str

Identifier for the line.

start_bus: Bus

The starting point bus of the line.

end_bus: Bus

The ending point bus of the line.

capacity: float

Maximum capacity of the line.

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Transformer(name: str, primary_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, secondary_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, capacity: float)

Bases: object

name: str

Identifier for the transformer.

primary_bus: Bus

Primary side bus of the transformer.

secondary_bus: Bus

Secondary side bus of the transformer.

capacity: float

Maximum capacity of the transformer.

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Link(name: str, start_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, end_bus: energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus, capacity: float)

Bases: object

name: str

Identifier for the link.

start_bus: Bus

The starting point bus of the link.

end_bus: Bus

The ending point bus of the link.

capacity: float

Maximum capacity of the link.

class energydatamodel.powergrid.SubNetwork(name: str, buses: List[energydatamodel.powergrid.Bus] = <factory>, lines: List[energydatamodel.powergrid.Line] = <factory>)

Bases: object

name: str

Name of the subnetwork.

buses: List[Bus]

Buses in the subnetwork.

lines: List[Line]

Lines in the subnetwork.

class energydatamodel.powergrid.Network(name: str, subnetworks: List[energydatamodel.powergrid.SubNetwork] = <factory>, transformers: List[energydatamodel.powergrid.Transformer] = <factory>, links: List[energydatamodel.powergrid.Link] = <factory>)

Bases: object

name: str

Name of the network.

subnetworks: List[SubNetwork]

Subnetworks in the network.

transformers: List[Transformer]

Transformers in the network.

links: List[Link]

Links in the network.
